data.comment: The match is underway at Gelredome.
In the minute 8, An attacking Vitesse player has been brought down in the area ... It's a penalty!
At Gelredome, Felix Wiedwald has been yellow-carded for the away team.
It's advantage Vitesse in Arnhem as Oussama Tannane scores from the spot to make it 1-0.
Simon Tibbling (Emmen) has received a yellow card from Jeroen Manschot.
In the minute 26, Goal! Oussama Tannane extends Vitesse's lead to 2-0.
At Gelredome, Riechedly Bazoer is shown a red card and sent off.
Keziah Veendorp for Emmen has been booked by Jeroen Manschot and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 44, Vitesse take a comfortable 3-0 lead thanks to Lois Openda.
Thomas Bruns with an assist there.
The first-half is over.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway in Arnhem.
The away team have replaced Simon Tibbling with Luciano Carty. This is the first substitution made today by Dick Lukkien.
Dick Lukkien (Emmen) is making a second substitution, with Lucas Bernadou replacing Michael Chacon.
In the minute 58, Michael de Leeuw puts the ball in the net and reduces the deficit to 3-1.
Luciano Carty instrumental with a fine assist.
Patrick Vroegh is on a sub for Lois Openda for Vitesse.
In the minute 62, Thomas Buitink is replacing Armando Broja for Vitesse at Gelredome.
Thomas Letsch is making the team's third substitution at Gelredome with Idrissa Toure replacing Thomas Bruns.
Vitesse make their fourth substitution with Oussama Darfalou replacing Oussama Tannane.
In the minute 76, The away team replace Keziah Veendorp with Sekou Sidibe.
Luciano Carty (Emmen) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Ricardo Van Rhijn is booked for the away team.
The match has come to a close in Arnhem. The final score is 3-1.
